name: Promoxity
tag_list: search-engine, local-commerce, consumer, retail, social-network, crm, inventory, geolocal, mobile, cpg, promotion, deal, group-buy, discount, coupon, bulk-buy, advertize, advertise
overview:
Promoxity, Your local search engine.

Don’t search for an address or “kind of” business in directories or alike.

Find the product or the service YOU WANT near you wherever you may be.

Promoxity helps:

  • Consumers, we all are, find the “Right” Deal (whatever the word right means to you: price, proximity, popularity, …) in their vicinity commerce.
  • City Commerce inform you about their Best Deals and promote their offerings so they can keep jobs in your vicinity.

Promoxity is three in one :

  • A Geo-localized search engine of products and services in City Commerce (Physical commerce not e-commerce).
  • The first Consumer oriented Social Network that REWARDS its members in cash (read $, £, €) for helping each other and the quality of their contributions.
  • The first CRM for City Commerce that allows local businesses to manage their inventory and promote their ENTIRE catalog to an audience of BUYERS searching on PROMOXITY for products and services to BUY in proximity.

If you like it share it, and keep using Promoxity the more of us get involved the better Promoxity will serve all.
